titleStmt.title: A copy of an address by the Bishop of Oxon to be subscribed by the clergy of his diociss, with the reasons for the subscription to the address, and the reasons against it.

notesStmt.note: "An attack on Bishop Parker, erroneously attributed to him by Wing"--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
